origin_prompt.content:
你能够调用以下的API:
{'name': 'StockAPI.get_historical_data', 'description': 'This function retrieves historical stock data for a specified company on a given date.', 'required_parameters': [{'name': 'company', 'type': 'STRING', 'description': 'The name of the company.'}, {'name': 'date', 'type': 'STRING', 'description': 'The date for which historical data is requested, in the format YYYY-MM-DD.'}], 'optional_parameters': [], 'return_data': [{'name': 'stock_data', 'description': 'The historical stock data including opening price, closing price, high, low, and volume.'}]}
请用以下格式进行回复:
想法: 你这一步的目标
动作: 你要调用的API名称
动作参数: JSON格式的参数输入,全部写在一行
调用工具 StockAPI.get_historical_data, 它的参数输入如下: 'company'是'Procter & Gamble', 'date'是'2025-03-01'.
